meta.title: Edit Profile
meta.description: Edit your tourist route profile, set your avatar, nickname and change your account settings.
meta.keywords: Edit Profile, Turistik Rota, Vacation Planning, Tour Reservation

users.title: Users
users.description: View, edit and manage users belonging to the business.

role.title: Role Management
role.description: In the field below, you can see and edit which privileges this user has in which modules.

info.title: About Role Editing.
info.desc: You may not have a role to add or remove roles. If you encounter an error when you try to add or remove roles, please contact your business administrator.

enable.title: Activate Business
enable.subtitle: Are you sure you want to activate your business?
enable.text: When you activate your business, it will be visible to everyone. You must be sure before activating it.
enable.label: Approval Text
enable.confirmation: To activate your business, please write '{{text}}' in the box below.

disable.title: Deactivate Business
disable.subtitle: Are you sure you want to deactivate your business?
disable.text: When you deactivate your business, it will not be visible to everyone. You must be sure before deactivating it.
disable.label: Approval Text
disable.confirmation: To deactivate your business, please write '{{text}}' in the box below.

logs.title: Business Logs
logs.text: You can view the logs of your business here.

read-users.title: Business Users
read-users.text: You can view the users of your business here.

utils.totalRole: There are a total of {{total}} roles.
